recommended_degree: Teknik Informatika, Sistem Informasi, Teknologi Game, Desain Komunikasi Visual, Animasi (Sarjana)
job_description:
Proficient in tools such as Blender, 3ds Max, Maya, or SolidWorks
Strong understanding of mechanical structure, manufacturing components, and industrial assets
Ability to optimize models for real-time use in AR/VR environments
Experience in texturing, lighting, and rendering for realistic visualizations
Basic animation or rigging skills are a plus
Detail-oriented, creative, and passionate about industrial visualization
